messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Armory.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Science.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near IPA Environment Epsilon, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: ATTENTION TO ALL CREW WITH NANITES: A New feature has been added to the nanite system,  saying "health" will scan your body and provide you a readout. Have a secure shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Base Construction.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near IPA Environment Epsilon, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of rodents have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that all of the station's [REDACTED] has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
